messages.content: What is a good 2TB NVME SSD with a  M.2 2280 forma factor and PCIE GEN 4x4 connectivity?
The Crucial MX500 is a good 2TB NVME SSD with M.2 2280 form factor and PCIe Gen 4x4 connectivity. It has a read speed of up to 3,500MB/s and a write speed of up to 2,700MB/s.
The Crucial MX500 works in most laptops, but it is important to check the laptop's specifications to ensure compatibility. Some laptops may require an NVMe SSD with a specific form factor or adapter.
